participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and energetic, Jessica loves to keep busy and explore new hobbies.
participant_1.background: I make sure to get plenty of exercise, even if my diet is not the best. I like to build furniture. My husband is a cop. My favourite colour is green. I'm looking forward to moving on to the next chapter in my life.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, Oliver enjoys the comfort of home and values his time with close friends and family.
participant_2.background: I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books. I have a collection of video games. I spend most of my time working, but I make time for my friends and family when I can. I try to do my job as best as I can. I am an avid runner.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy reading mermaid books and drinking hot chocolate.
That sounds like a great way to relax!
It is, and it helps me to escape from the real world for a while.
I can understand that. I like to build furniture when I'm feeling creative.
That sounds like a fun hobby! I'm not very good at working with my hands, but I can appreciate the work that goes into it.
Thanks! It's something I really enjoy doing.
What kind of furniture do you like to build?
I like to build all sorts of things, but my favorite is probably building tables.
Tables are always useful. I'm sure you're very good at it.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot of interesting hobbies.
Thanks! I like to keep busy.
I can see that. It sounds like you have a lot of energy.
I do! I'm always looking for new things to do.
That's great! I'm more of a homebody, but I enjoy trying new things every once in a while.
I can understand that. It's important to have a balance between staying active and relaxing.
